# color

**Instance Property**

The color of the light source.

## Declaration

```swift
var color: CGColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default color corresponds to a color temperature of 6500 K, as described by the [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLPhysicallyPlausibleLight/setColorByTemperature(_:)] method.

## Managing Light Color and Intensity

- **lumens**: The total visible intensity of the light source, in lumens.
- **setColorByTemperature(_:)**: Sets the light’s color based on a black-body temperature.
